name: RegexReplace
description: Option to allow matching and replacing incoming messages

config.name: regexReplaceMatchRegex
config.label: Regex to match with
config.description: If message content matchs this regex pattern, it matching part will be replaced with the below.

config.name: regexReplaceString
config.label: Replacement test for matched Regex
config.description: This string will be what replaced the matched regex sections.
